dublin_core.dcvalue: Significant events are unfolding in the field of eHealth in Europe eHealth has been a strategic priority of the European Commission in both the eEurope 2002 and 2005 Action Plans But how are developments on the national level progressing The authors contrast the status quo of eHealth in the EU 15 with the latest trends and key action priorities in the EU 25 after the Union s latest enlargement in May 2004 The initiatives and actions of the European Commission are presented vis vis those of national Member States particularly in terms of strategic priorities and implementation actions The review is accompanied by an analysis of expert feedback on eHealth drivers and barriers
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:40:46Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2005-08-17
World hospitals and health services : the official journal of the International Hospital Federation
eHealth in Europe: towards higher goals.
